system.description:
Your mind is a towering citadel of scholarship and knowledge. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence increases by +1, to a maximum of 20. If it is already 20, you may increase your Wisdom or Charisma by +1 instead, also to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with your choice of Alchemist’s Supplies or the Herbalist’s Kit.
  • Your Savant levels count as Wizard levels for the purpose of determining the spell slots you can get back with Arcane Recovery.
